message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it's worth it at $120.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $60 is significantly lower than what I can accept. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget.
